item.value: Sneezing with your eyes open is impossible
The 1921 Nobel Prize in Physics was won by Albert Einstein for his work in the field of theoretical physics.
Alexander Graham Bell is credited with inventing the first telephone in 1876.
The shortest person in the world is Khagendra Thapa Maga. He is 56 cm ( 22 in ) tall. The shortest woman was Pauline Muster. She was 58 cm ( 23 in ) tall.
Orville and Wilbur Wright achieved the first flight of an airplane.on the morning of December 17, 1903.
The biggest planet in the Solar System is Jupiter. It is 317 times as heavy as the earth
The tallest woman was Zeng Jinlian. She was 2.48 meters ( 8ft 2in ) tall.
The moon orbits the Earth every 27.32 days
A shark can hear a fish in the water from more than a mile away.
There are around 2000 different plant types that humans use as food.
On July 20, 1969, Neil Armstrong became the first human to step on the moon.
Steve Wozniak designed the first Apple computer in 1976. It was known as the Apple I.
By 2008 there were almost 1.3 billion telephone lines in the world.
The blue whale is the largest known animal on Earth. Mature blue whales can measure anywhere from 75 feet (23 m) to 100 feet (30.5 m) long and can weigh as much as 150 tons.
The Population of the Earth is about 6,800,000,000 (6.80 billion) people.
The Sun's outer layer has a temperature of 6,000C . Inside the sun the temperature is 15,000,000 C.
Mount McKinley in Alaska in the highest mountain in America. It is 20,320 ft high.
The Population of the Earth is about 6,800,000,000 (6.80 billion). China has the most people, its population is 1.3 billion.
In the Summer of 1896 the first modern Olympics was held in Athens, Greece. The 2012 Olympics will be held in London.
The closest planet to earth is Venus. It is about 38 million kilometers away. It would take over 4 years to travel there by plane.
